entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog at times overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
